title: Royal Enfield wholesales rise 6 pc in February
description: Royal Enfield, a part of Eicher Motors, reported a 6% YoY increase in wholesales to 75,935 units in February. Domestic sales grew 5% to 67,922 units, and exports rose 13% to 8,013 units. Existing motorcycles contributed to the strong growth. CEO B Govindarajan is confident about a healthy overall performance.
